info.name: Firefox 4 on Linux - Native Tabs
info.description: This style is no longer being maintained and has some issues in recent Firefox releases. You may be interested in the GTK+ Native theme by Mike Henning instead. This user style makes the tabs in Firefox 4 on Linux a native look and feel, like tabs in other GTK+ apps. Tested with Firefox 4.0 Stable on Ubuntu 10.10 with a slightly modified version of the Ambiance theme (only colors were changed).
info.additionalInfo:
Known issues:
* There is no border between the tab bar and the navigation toolbar.  This is not reflected in the screenshots as they were taken in an older beta version of Firefox 4 that didn't have this problem.
